column4: can anyone please help me resolve an apt dependency issue? I can't install my new graphics driver until I install my old, but I can't uninstall my old because one of it's deps is missing and I can't find a package for it anywhere
have you tried removing the fglrx drivers beforehand?
how did you install the driver?
I really don't remember. I had a lot of problems and installed and uninstalled several times, clearly I munged something up
did you use the wiki page at all?
there are a few different pages with different directions I tried them all
I found this http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=146014&highlight=xorg-driver-fglrx+uninstall I'm hesitant to try step for in dinxter's post but I might have to
have you tried the reintall method?
can't reinstall because it's missing the mesa driver which I can't find anywhere
I think I'll try editing the postrm and hope for the best! Thanks for your time
